content.description: This is a sequential face climb up beautiful red and dark blue patina. It trends slightly right up mostly great pockets. A few bullet holes just above the big hueco marks this route. It has 3 bolts.
content.protection: Bring a stick clip, the landing is less than perfect. 3 bolts, 2 bolt anchor.

content.description:
Sustained balancing act up a line of small pockets between

Trigger Happy

and the moderate crack.

climbs.name: Sling A Ling A Ding Dong
climbs.fa: William Mondragon, Bob D'Antonio, Andrew McClure

content.description:
This route is between

Mr. Nobody

and

Collapsing Stars

. It starts out as a face climb then turns into an arÃªte climb. This has big holds the all the way.

On the other side of the arete from

More Than Life

is the Red Sea Pedestrian. This is a 3 bolt climb that follows a series of the coolest holds. The crux is at the last bolt, and there is a little run to the anchors, but it's mellow climbing.

climbs.name: Mr. Nobody
climbs.fa: William Mondragon, Bob D'Antonio, Nathan Martinez

content.description: This route goes right up the middle of a beautiful, tan face. Bring a stick clip for this one. The first 2 bolts have easier climbing with nice pockets, the business comes right after 2nd bolt, a V6 dyno to a huge pocket. After this, the climbing turns easy again all the way to the anchors.
Cleaned-ish choss at the bottom turns to big reaches and small pockets. One star down and two grades up from its buddy route.
content.location:
It shares anchors with

Mr. D'Antonio

.

content.description: This involves sequential pocket pulling just right of the black streak. It has 2 cruxes and ascends good rock.

This ascends the pin scar crack just right of

More Than Life

. Climb past 3 bolts up a stunning dark blue crack. It has very tricky movement to get to the good holds below the tree.
This is the razor cut arete on the most beautiful face at the Pharcyde. A very bouldery start (V7) gains the perfect arete. It is a personal favorite of mine.
content.protection: Definitely stick clip this one. 4 bolts, 2 bolt anchor.

content.description: Climb a slightly overhanging start on small pockets to amazing jugs higher up!
content.location:
This is 3 routes to the right of

Mr. Nobody

.

climbs.name: The Jewpacabra
climbs.fa: Morgan Barnes, William Mondragon, Andrew McClure

content.description:
This climbs perfect pockets and edges up red patina'ed face just right of

Mr. Barnes

. It is sustained 5.11, but the crux is at the top.
Begin with a hard start to lots of good pockets higher up. Watch out for some loose stuff up high.
content.location:
It is in between

Sling A Ling A Ding Dong

and

Collapsing Stars

.

content.description: This route climbs the sweet red face at the east end of the cliff. It climbs sweet pockets and edges for the first few bolts then the crux on a barndoory rail, and you're home free.
content.location: This ascends the red face at east end of cliffband.

content.description:
This is a perfect, round arete with slopers and pinches. Sit down start. Classic.

The name "Coon and Friends" is in reference to a South Park episode where Cartman is literally a raccoon super hero.
content.location:
This is on the big boulder right below the

More Than Life

wall, you can see this problem from

More Than Life

.

climbs.name: Collapsing Stars
climbs.fa: Morgan Barnes, Lydia Gillespie, William Mondragon

content.description:
Ascend a nice, hueco'ed face to the right of

Mr. Nobody

.  It is a warm-up for the area.

Classic pocket traverse! For the original 4 Better or 4 Worse, stand start in the big pocket in the middle of the face. Traverse left along pockets, then head straight up the face before the arete. The sit start adds a couple moves and a grade.
content.location: On the massive boulder with the X, this problem is in the overhang on the backside.
